content.description: Somewhere Systems (@somewheresy) is an engineering-focused account on X, sharing discussions on topics such as psychedelics, politics, and personal experiences. The account has a large following and engages with other users, including experts and journalists. The content includes quotes, articles, and media, showcasing a wide range of interests and perspectives.
